author: Staff Reporter
text:
Burglars broke into a house in Pulianthope and allegedly stole gold jewellery and cash on Friday, police said. The burglars, who are yet to be identified, had broken into the house of Krishnaveni (49).

Krishnaveni works at a house-keeping firm in Egmore. The incident is said to have taken place while she was at work.

Five sovereigns of gold and some cash were reported missing. She lodged a complaint with the police after she returned from work and found the valuables missing.
title: House break-in at Pulianthope
